entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
